metadata.title: CVE-2024-42223 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: dvb-frontends: tda10048: Fix integer overflowstate->xtal_hz can be up to 16M, so it can overflow a 32 bit integerwhen multiplied by pll_mfactor.Create a new 64 bit variable to hold the calculations.
